title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 754 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 08, 2011

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 754





	On Wednesday, June 8, 2011, the President signed into law: 

	H.R. 754, the “Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2011,” which authorizes FY 2011 appropriations for U.S. intelligence-related activities, and establishes and amends various intelligence-related authorities.
